bill.title: Alcoholic beverages, light wine and beer; allow any municipality in dry county to vote on legalizing sales of in the municipality.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 67-1-14, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Any Municipality Located In A County That Has Voted Against Coming Out From Under The Dry Law May Conduct A Local Option Election On The Question Of Whether Alcoholic Beverages May Be Sold Or Possessed In The Municipality; To Amend Section 67-3-9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Any Municipality In A County That Has Voted Against Coming Out From Under The Dry Law May Conduct A Local Option Election On The Question Of Whether Beer And Light Wine May Be Sold Or Possessed In The Municipality; And For Related Purposes.
